name: Renovo srl
businessDescription: Renovo S.r.l. develops advanced robotic recycling solutions for end-of-life photovoltaic panels. By optimizing material recovery of silicon, glass, and metals, we enable closed-loop recycling systems that reduce waste, lower costs, and support the circular economy in the renewable energy sector.
longBusinessDescription:
Renovo S.r.l. is transforming the end-of-life management of photovoltaic panels through innovative automated robotic processes.
Our project focuses on introducing advanced recycling solutions that optimize material recovery and reintegration into new production cycles. By implementing cutting-edge filtration and processing technologies, we enhance the circularity of our operations, reducing waste and maximizing resource efficiency.
This initiative aligns with our commitment to sustainability by introducing a new approach to our core business. The expected outcome is a scalable, efficient, and environmentally friendly recycling system that supports the circular economy.
Renovo S.r.l. specializes in the recycling of end-of-life photovoltaic panels, addressing one of the main sustainability challenges in the renewable energy sector: the inefficient recovery of valuable materials. Our primary challenge is to develop automated and cost-effective technologies that maximize material recovery while minimizing environmental impact.
We have already conducted feasibility studies and tested preliminary automation processes, showing strong potential to increase recovery rates of silicon, glass, and metals. By further refining and integrating these technologies, we aim to create a closed-loop recycling system that significantly reduces waste, decreases dependence on virgin materials, and improves circularity in the photovoltaic sector.
This project is fully aligned with Renovo’s long-term strategy to lead sustainable solar panel recycling by improving efficiency, reducing processing costs, and contributing to the circular economy.

name: Cubish
businessDescription:
Cubish is a seamless experience where the digital world merges with the physical.
It's already around you anywhere on Earth.
tags: Spatial Web, Geo Web, Immersive Tech
longBusinessDescription:
Cubish digitally divides the entire surface of the Earth into over 5.1 trillion cubes, each covering 100 square meters of real-world space.
Each cube is a geolocated container where anyone can create one or more Cube Domains, digital spaces that can host multimedia content such as videos, audio, images, documents, and much more.
Thousands of Cube Domains, owned by different people, can coexist within a single cube, creating a unique layering of data in the real world.
In the future, Cube Domains within each cube will be organized based on content quality, thanks to a merit-based system that will highlight the relevance, usefulness, and impact of each Cube Domain.
Who is it for? Cubish is an open, general-purpose system, just like the web once was.
"The cube will relate to Cube Domains like a search engine relates to web domains."
With one fundamental difference: Cube Domains are anchored to real-world coordinates and can be expanded into other cubes through expansions, across entire areas, squares, shops, buildings, public or private spaces, even far apart from each other.
Each expansion of a Cube Domain can host different content based on its location, shaping a distributed, geolocated digital network.
"It's like taking a web domain and spreading it across the real world."
Today, it starts with data. Tomorrow, immersive technologies will be integrated.
Cubish paves the way for the coexistence of digital and immersive realities, layered onto physical spaces.
It is the first true Spatial Web, designed to bring the web into the real world and create an intelligent, living digital layer integrated into the space around us.
Cubish S.r.l. is an innovative startup officially registered in the Business Register (VAT: IT10724711212). The company is composed of 26 cofounders, including two corporate entities.
Cubish is protected by PATENT PENDING No. 102025000004906, filed on March 10, 2025, and currently within the 18-month confidentiality period.

name: THE HOUSE FARMER
businessDescription:
"JOCONDO is a SMART GARDEN for urban gardens (but can also be used for plants), specifically focused on metropolitan terraces and balconies with the following innovative features:
 - DESIGN: a colored, washable and replaceable non-woven outer sock, even if only for aesthetic reasons
 - WATER AUTONOMY: a 32 litres reservoir allows the user to be away for at least three weeks if growing vegetables and even longer for herbs, without risking the usual summer slaughter of plants or crops left to 'bake' in the sun with insufficient water
 - MOBILITY: thanks to its 4 wheels, which are also very functional and aesthetic, Jocondo can be moved for cleaning, to protect it from extreme weather events (water and sun) and to bring it inside during the cold months, as it is also an element of furniture and design, facilitated by its standard non-excessive size of 40x60cm
 - TECHNOLOGY: This is one of the first, or perhaps the first, active irrigation system for balconies/terraces thanks to the presence inside (between the external sock and the tank) of a pump, an electronic board and a battery. The system will initially be equipped with 4 sensors: soil moisture, room temperature, air quality and water level in the tank. In the future, we will also include the soil acidity sensor. Everything is easily controlled by the user through an APP that will also give advice on which crops to grow depending on their latitude
 - MODULARITY: Jocondo is the first modular pot (Lego garden) with the possibility of associating a module vertically (40x120cm) or horizontally (60x80cm) with the exact same characteristics, taking advantage of the standard pot. The additional piece will consequently be much cheaper than the mother pot, including all technological equipment"
tags: Smart Garden Technology, Sustainable Urban Gardening, Community Gardening Network, Community Gardening Network

name: Niverbec
businessDescription:
"Niverbec is a MedTech startup pioneering digital emergency healthcare through its innovative project, Niver. Our technology allows first responders to access, strictly limited to authorized rescuers, vital medical data in seconds—overcoming language barriers and unconscious patient conditions.
 Niver is not a digital health record but a first-emergency data readout, providing emergency responders with critical medical information such as medical conditions, pathologies, allergies, medications, patient identification, and the referring care physician who recorded the data—an Emergency Sheet designed to enhance rapid medical intervention.
 Unlike traditional health data systems, often paper-based, Niver operates on passive, energy-efficient memory storage, ensuring privacy and securitywithout centralized servers that consume excessive energy. Our B2B2C model collaborates with doctors and emergency professionals to certify data, making it a reliable, life-saving solution for travelers, elderly individuals, and those with chronic conditions.
 By bridging the gap between emergency response and digital health accessibility, Niver is reshaping the future of emergency healthcare."

name: ResilientX Security
businessDescription:
"Supply chain cyber attacks are rising, with SMBs as the weakest link due to limited security budgets. Yet, enterprises still rely on slow, error-prone, and costly manual assessments, spreadsheets, and questionnaires to manage third-party risk. With NIS2, 160,000 European enterprises must now prove robust risk management or face severe penalties, but many are unprepared.
 ResilientX automates Third-Party Risk Management, reducing assessment time by 80% and cutting compliance costs in half. Our platform streamlines vendor evaluations, automates compliance workflows, and provides real-time risk insights, ensuring companies stay secure and compliant at scale. 
 We operate on a license model, with pricing based on the number of vendors assessed. Initially scaling through channel partnerships with resellers and MSPs, we are now driving direct sales through targeted cold outreach and enterprise engagement. In our first year, we generated €150K in revenue and secured investment from top European VCs and the Italian government. Backed by a leadership team with 40+ years in cybersecurity, tech, and VC, including a successful exit in the industry, we’re on track for 3x revenue growth and reaching break-even by mid-year."
tags: Unified Exposure Management, Third-Party Risk Management, Automated Security Testing

Additionally, 20Seconds generates revenue via in-app ads, partnerships with its 20Podcast and more.

name: snAIke
businessDescription: snAIke operates at the intersection of artificial intelligence and smart mobility, developing AI-driven solutions that enhance transportation efficiency, safety, and sustainability. Our business model revolves around providing AI-powered software and analytics to cities, transportation agencies, and mobility service providers, enabling them to optimize traffic flow, reduce congestion, and improve overall infrastructure performance and safety. At the core of our technology is a Digital Twin model, which creates virtual replicas of real-world transportation networks, allowing for real-time simulations, predictive analytics, and continuous optimization. By combining AI with smart city infrastructure, snAIke aims to revolutionize urban transportation, making travel more seamless, connected, and environmentally responsible.

name: Exvirience

"Exvirience revolutionizes industrial maintenance through a remote assistance platform powered by extended reality (XR - virtual + augmented reality). Our three-sided platform seamlessly connects machine manufacturers, certified maintenance providers, and client companies. By leveraging XR technology, we enable real-time, remote maintenance support, ensuring swift problem resolution without the need for on-site visits.
 
 This approach democratizes access to advanced maintenance solutions, making them more affordable and efficient. Exvirience serves as the intermediary that bridges technical expertise with industrial needs, helping manufacturers provide top-tier assistance to their clients. Our technology not only reduces downtime but also enhances the overall quality and reliability of industrial operations​​."

name: LOKI

The low-cost, plug & play hardware easily installs on any vehicle, continuously gathering high-resolution images and sensor readings. Our technology classifies road defects (potholes and other surface irregularities) by severity, and road elements (road signs, crosswalks, storm drain etc). By integrating earth observation, weather, and traffic data, enables truly proactive maintenance.The business model includes scanning-as-a-service for municipalities, subscription-based monitoring, and on-board hardware setups for large fleets.

By leveraging an innovative tech stack, including self-hosted solutions and AI-powered features, Stageflow offers a scalable and secure platform that simplifies complex event processes. name: Cosmo

The platform is guided by an interactive AI tutor, which provides real-time support, generates multi-format content, and continuously monitors user progress. This ensures a tailored, engaging, and effective learning experience, supported by analytics tools for HR teams to measure training impact and identify skill gaps.
 
 Our business model operates on two streams. The second focuses on corporate clients, with Future Berry, Cosmo's parent company, acting as the certifying authority. This dual approach creates a scalable ecosystem that integrates cutting-edge technology with trusted certification frameworks."

name: Deplotic
businessDescription:
"Deplotic offers an integrated robotic manipulator, known as IDRA (Inflatable and Deployable Robotic Arm), designed for autonomous satellite inspection and maintenance. IDRA features inflatable links and electrically actuated joints, minimizing its stowed volume while maximizing its workspace when deployed. 
 This technology enables on-board repairs, upgrades, and other ISAM (In-space Assembly and Manufacturing) operations directly on the satellite, eliminating the need for auxiliary spacecraft.
 The business model is based on selling IDRA with an installation price of €2.5 million, supplemented by an annual service fee for support and maintenance."

name: Anostra
businessDescription: Anostra aims to make autonomous farming accessible to all. tags: Autonomous Farming, Farm Management Software, AgriTech Innovation

name: Alpha Wearables
businessDescription: Alpha αXon operates on a direct-to-consumer and B2B model, leveraging cutting-edge biosensor technology to bridge mental and physical well-being. Our wearable earsets integrate EEG, PPG, motion tracking, and temperature sensors, delivering real-time insights into focus, stress, and cognitive balance via the Hyper.me app. The technology employs a proprietary algorithm (TIRN - Transformation in Neural Resonance) to translate raw brain and physiological data into actionable feedback for productivity and well-being. Initially targeting early adopters and professionals, we aim to expand into corporate wellness, healthcare, and transportation safety through strategic partnerships.

To empower insurance companies with actionable insights derived from satellite imagery. We strive to enhance disaster preparedness and facilitate informed decision-making in risk management. Our mission is to be the leading provider of satellite analytical solutions in the industry. We aim to promote resilience and proactive responses to natural disasters.

name: doctorhouse

The platform operates without intermediation fees, providing flexibility for both users and practitioners. name: Mnsimu
businessDescription:
"In a context where digital tourism is rapidly expanding and travelers are increasingly seeking personalized and
 immediate experiences, PuntoMare stands out as a cutting-edge solution that redefines how tourists experience
 seaside vacations.
 The platform effectively addresses common challenges faced by tourists, such as the unpredictability of marine
 conditions and the lack of detailed information about local services. Thanks to a proprietary marine weather
 forecasting algorithm based on geospatial and meteorological data, PuntoMare provides ultra-local forecasts for
 each beach, enabling visitors to plan their days optimally. The nature of the algorithm allows it to be patented as
 a process.
 Additionally, the integration of an AI Agent, named "Punto," provides personalized assistance, answering
 questions and offering recommendations like a local tour guide.
 PuntoMare differentiates itself from competitors through a unique combination of advanced technologies and
 strategic focus: while existing platforms primarily concentrate on customer acquisition before arrival (destination
 marketing), PuntoMare focuses on proximity marketing and post-arrival engagement, delivering added value to
 both tourists and local operators.
 The business model includes both a B2C component, represented by a transaction commission on bookings made
 for beach facilities, rentals, experiences, and restaurants (partnered through affiliate programs with Spiagge.it,
 Viator, Musement, and Quandoo), and a B2B component, based on advertising sales and data monetization.
 The multidisciplinary team is one of the key pillars of Mnsimu Srls’s success. Professionals with complementary
 expertise in technology, commerce, and finance work synergistically to realize the company’s mission."
tags: Marine Forecasts, Eco Friendly Tourism, Digital Beach Experience

name: MakerBox
businessDescription: Say goodbye to boring bios and mismatched covers. MakerBox helps creators put together sleek, coherent profiles that truly represent who they are and what they do.With AI at the helm, your content is personalized, professional, and powerful—without the extra work.
tags: SaaS, Startup, AI Tools, Creator Economy
longBusinessDescription:
MakerBox is your secret weapon for standing out in the indie maker crowd. Whether you're launching on Product Hunt or growing your Twitter following, MakerBox helps you write bios that reflect your voice, create bold profile visuals, and polish your digital identity to match your hustle.
Instead of wasting hours tweaking your profile or overthinking your intro, MakerBox handles it with smart AI tools built for indie founders and creators. It’s the fastest way to turn your profile into a lead magnet and make every click count.

name: Rosmami
businessDescription: Rosmami is an app that helps you manage your grocery shopping in a smarter and more sustainable way. It promotes conscious food choices and reduces waste. The company is based in Piedmont, Italy, and was founded in 2024
tags: App, E-Commerce, Food and Beverage, Grocery, Shopping
longBusinessDescription:
Rosmami is a foodtech startup founded in 2024 and based in Piedmont, Italy. The company has developed an innovative mobile app that transforms the grocery shopping experience by helping families reduce food waste, save money, and make more sustainable choices.
Through the use of artificial intelligence, Rosmami analyzes household consumption habits and pantry data to generate personalized shopping lists and meal plans. The app suggests recipes based on ingredients already available at home, allowing users to optimize their weekly shopping and avoid unnecessary purchases. By promoting a conscious and circular approach to food planning, Rosmami empowers users to cut down on waste and reduce their environmental impact.
The business model combines a freemium approach with premium features available by subscription, as well as affiliate partnerships with retailers and brands. Rosmami addresses both B2C and B2B segments, offering value to families, supermarkets, and food producers by enhancing customer engagement, providing insights, and promoting sustainable consumption patterns.
Rosmami’s mission is to make everyday food decisions smarter, easier, and more sustainable—one meal at a time.

name: Micropedia
businessDescription: Micropedia is a software company and web agency founded in 2015 by Marco Ilardi. We specialize in developing tailored web and mobile applications, SEO consulting, and brand reputation consultancy. We operate successfully across Italy, from Trentino to Sicily, and have expanded internationally, serving clients in the United States, Canada, and even Macao.
tags: Business Development, Project Management, SEO, Social Media Marketing, Software, Web Development, E-Commerce, Software Development, Mobile App, Business Solution

tags: Scalable Blockchain Solutions for Real-World Impact

name: FiscoGenio AI
businessDescription:
FiscoGenio AI is a LegalTech SaaS transforming tax law research in Italy.

Our platform empowers tax professionals with instant, AI-powered access to official legal documents, reducing research time from hours to minutes. 

Unlike generic GenAI tools, FiscoGenio is trained on structured, trusted tax sources (like the Agenzia delle Entrate) and delivers precise, cited answers to complex legal questions. With features like real-time compliance alerts, natural language queries, and document summarization, we help accountants, tax lawyers, and consultants stay compliant, efficient, and competitive.

We’re on a mission to become the go-to tax intelligence platform for Italy’s €35B professional services market.
tags: LegalTech, Tax AI, SaaS for Accountants, RegTech
longBusinessDescription:
FiscoGenio AI is an AI-powered legal research SaaS built specifically for Italian tax professionals.
In a sector plagued by bureaucratic complexity, frequent regulatory updates, and inefficient search tools, FiscoGenio brings clarity and speed. Our platform allows users to ask any tax-related question in natural language, like speaking to a colleague, and instantly receive accurate, contextualised answers with official citations from sources like the Agenzia delle Entrate.
We combine a powerful GenAI model with the structure of a legal database to ensure precision, compliance, and trust. Beyond Q&A, FiscoGenio also summarizes complex legal texts, sends real-time alerts on tax updates, and enables comparative analysis across multiple documents.
We serve solo accountants, tax lawyers, consulting firms, and corporate legal departments, offering flexible plans that scale with your needs.
FiscoGenio aims to become the leading tax intelligence platform in Italy by making legal research faster, smarter, and more accessible. Backed by a strong founding team in AI and law, we’re shaping the future of tax consultancy through human-AI collaboration.

name: AI Cartoon Generator
businessDescription: AI Cartoon Generator is an innovative AI-powered tool that transforms text and photos into stunning cartoon-style images. With a wide range of artistic styles, customization options, and high-quality outputs, users can easily create unique avatars, social media content, and brand illustrations. Whether for personal fun or professional design, it offers a seamless and engaging experience for generating personalized cartoon characters with just a few clicks.

longBusinessDescription: Bikinilista is your go-to destination for elevated swimwear and beachwear that fuses fashion-forward design with everyday comfort. From curve-enhancing bikinis to statement one-pieces and essential beach accessories, our handpicked collection empowers women to look and feel their best in the sun. Crafted with premium fabrics, modern silhouettes, and an eye for detail, Bikinilista offers styles for every mood—be it timeless, bold, or effortlessly sporty. Because at Bikinilista, every beach day is a style moment.

name: Renovo srl
businessDescription: Renovo S.r.l. is boldly redefining the future of photovoltaic panel recycling. In a world racing toward renewable energy, we’re tackling the silent crisis few dare to face: the end-of-life management of solar panels. Our advanced robotic cells are engineered to dismantle, sort, and process every panel with surgical precision — extracting maximum value while minimizing environmental impact.
tags: Recycling, Robotic, Circular Economy, Robotic, Solar Panel
longBusinessDescription:
Renovo S.r.l. is an innovative startup with the goal of
 revolutionizing the photovoltaic panel disposal and
 recycling sector through the development of
 advanced robotic cells. With the growing capacity
 of photovoltaic installations in Italy and beyond, the
 need for efficient and sustainable solutions for
 managing the end-of-life of solar panels is
 continuously increasing. Renovo S.r.l. not only offers
 solutions for panel disposal but also aims to
 support the entire upstream recycling process,
 ensuring that recycled materials are carefully
 filtered, processed, and reintegrated into new
 production cycles

name: ETAK
businessDescription: We develop and manufacture innovative Waste-to-Energy (WtE) systems. Our proprietary solution efficiently transforms municipal solid waste into high-calorific syngas, providing a clean and sustainable energy source for industrial and commercial clients across Europe.
tags: Waste-to-Energy, Syngas Production, Clean Tech, Circular Economy
longBusinessDescription:
Our startup is revolutionizing the Waste-to-Energy industry with advanced technology that converts mixed municipal waste into high-calorie syngas. Our system processes up to 6 tons of waste per hour and produces up to 4,000 cubic meters of syngas per hour, with a calorific value of 8,000 kcal/m³.
This high-efficiency solution is both environmentally and economically superior to traditional incineration plants. Our production line enables rapid return on investment (within 1.5 years), even when offering gas at a 50% market discount. We target energy-intensive industries, district heating providers, and utility companies seeking decarbonization and energy independence.
Headquartered in Italy and focused on expanding across Europe, we aim to become a key player in the circular economy and energy transition by turning waste into value.

name: BarBot
businessDescription: BarBot: Your pocket bartender—discover cocktails, log drinks, and enjoy AI-driven recommendations.

longBusinessDescription: BarBot is your personal bartender in your pocket, designed to revolutionize your cocktail experience. With over 3,000 curated cocktail recipes sourced from iconic cocktail books worldwide, BarBot helps you discover new favorites tailored to your tastes and available ingredients. Effortlessly manage your home bar inventory, log and track your cocktail journeys, and enjoy personalized recommendations from your AI bartender. Whether you're a seasoned mixologist or a weekend cocktail enthusiast, BarBot makes exploring cocktails fun, interactive, and rewarding.

longBusinessDescription:
Founders Firm is more than a legal service—we’re a partner for high-growth businesses. Built by founders, for founders, we understand the unique challenges of scaling, and we’re here to guide you through every critical decision with expertise and agility.
Our team of seasoned lawyers and operators serves startups and small businesses in all aspects of their legal needs - corporate, commercial, compliance, privacy, and more.

name: Lumigo
businessDescription: Lumigo is an AI search engine that revolutionises online product search, offering transparent results without sponsored ads. We analyse reviews, blogs and trusted sources to help you find exactly what you need.

name: AI Cartoon Generator
businessDescription: AI Cartoon Generator is an innovative AI-powered tool that transforms text and photos into stunning cartoon-style images. With a wide range of artistic styles, customization options, and high-quality outputs, users can easily create unique avatars, social media content, and brand illustrations. Whether for personal fun or professional design, it offers a seamless and engaging experience for generating personalized cartoon characters with just a few clicks.

name: STARTEX AI
businessDescription: Startex is an AI-powered smart marketplace that revolutionizes M&A operations for SMEs, micro-enterprises, and startups. It automates and optimizes the entire buying and selling process, making it more efficient, faster, and accessible. It supports all parties at every stage, from finding the perfect match to finalizing agreements, simplifying and accelerating every step.

name: AllStent
businessDescription: Perfecting Stent-graft Implantation, one stent at a time
longBusinessDescription: We are a cardiovascular AI-driven startup simulating the thoracic endovascular aortic repair treatment (TEVAR) in the pre-operative phase. With our approach, we increase dramatically the current granularity of insights based on which the surgeons choose the stent device for each patient. We are 3D reconstructing the CT scans of the patient, obtaining its "TEVAR-twin", then we simulate dinamically and interactively the interaction between the patient-specific geometry and the different stent candidates. We continue by post-processing it using curated AI models to gather all points of view surgeons are interested in seeing to make a data-driven decision. Our tool is a clinical decision making support system based on a patented and validated workflow, with more than 90% accuracy.

name: Jobiri.com
businessDescription: Jobiri is the 1st AI-powered digital career coach, helping job seekers, institutions, and coaches accelerate employment with smart CVs, job search tools & coaching. Trusted by 150K+ users & top institutions. Join Jobiri.com today!
tags: It uses AI to assist with job search and career growth
longBusinessDescription:
Jobiri is a groundbreaking AI-powered digital career consultant that has revolutionized career coaching. As the leading digital career coaching platform, Jobiri cuts job search time, increases salary potential, and provides cutting-edge tools to accelerate employment, enhance institutional career services, and expand the impact of career professionals.
With +150,000 individuals, 1,200 career coaches, and numerous institutions already benefiting, Jobiri is a key player in the employment ecosystem, trusted by universities, vocational training centers, job centers, HR firms, and municipalities.
Jobiri offers an all-in-one platform with innovative, AI-driven career tools to simplify and streamline the job search process:
- AI CV Builder to create optimized CVs that get noticed and land interviews faster.
- AI-Powered Job Search Aggregator to find job opportunities more efficiently.
- LinkedIn Profile Builder based on AI to improve and optimize LinkedIn profiles to stand out from competitors.
- Job Search Masterclass with over 150 expert video lessons to navigate the job market successfully.
- Self service video interview training to practice with hundreds of interview questions and answers to boost confidence and performance.
- Personalized Career Coaching provided with certified career coaches for tailored job search support.
Jobiri has earned multiple national and international awards, confirming its pioneering role in AI-powered career coaching.
- Are you a job seeker looking to accelerate your career?
- Are you an institution seeking to enhance career services?
- Are you a career coach aiming to create a greater social impact?
Join Jobiri.com today and unlock the future of career coaching!

name: Alessio Sbrana
businessDescription: Consulente digital marketing con 20 anni di esperienza
tags: SEO, SEM, advertising, web marketing, digital marketing, e-commerce
longBusinessDescription:
Da circa 20 anni mi occupo di strategie di web marketing: nel corso della mia carriera ho avuto l'opportunità di lavorare come freelance, imprenditore e responsabile dei team digital per varie agenzie di digital marketing.
Questi ruoli mi hanno dato modo di lavorare per siti aziendali, istituzionali, onlus, gruppi bancari, multinazionali, pmi, info-commerce e, soprattutto, siti di commercio elettronico.
Il miei "primi amori” sono stati la SEO e la SEM, ma la generazione di traffico, se pur "di qualità", non può bastare: negli anni ho approfondito le mie conoscenze in ambito digital con l’obiettivo di aumentare il profitto economico delle aziende attraverso il web, in modo particolare grazie alla conversion optimization (CRO) e alla marketing automation.

name: Jidoka Studio
businessDescription: Digital Transformation Studio: Intelligent Automation for Company Growth.
tags: digital transformation, digital automation, digital projects, marketing automation
longBusinessDescription:
Every client has unique needs, and we are committed to offering customized solutions in sales, marketing and operations, which combine the best of technology and human ingenuity, creating a perfect balance between automation and control.
Thanks to our experience, we are able to design the best possible path, useful for achieving the company's goals.

name: WormApp LogiCity
businessDescription: WormApp optimises urban delivery and smart city services with multifunctional locations, reducing traffic, costs and environmental impact.
tags: Last mile delivery, Smart city services, Mobility transportation and logistics, Environment Pollution and Climate
longBusinessDescription:
WormApp revolutionises services through in-city drop-off points, equipped with signage and monitoring, reducing or eliminating road congestion. All these activities are intermediated by a business-side and a client-side App.

longBusinessDescription:
Cerca Commercialista is an innovative digital platform designed to help businesses and professionals in Italy easily find and compare accountants based on location, industry, and specific services. Whether you're a startup, freelancer, or established company, our goal is to simplify the search process and connect you with the right financial expert to manage your accounting, taxation, and business compliance needs.
Finding a reliable accountant in Italy can be a time-consuming and frustrating process. Many businesses struggle to identify the right professional who understands their industry and specific financial requirements. Traditional search methods rely on word-of-mouth or generic directories that don’t offer tailored recommendations.
Cerca Commercialista was created to eliminate this challenge by providing a smart, searchable database of verified accountants across Italy. With our platform, users can filter professionals based on:
Location (city, region)
Industry expertise (real estate, retail, tech, healthcare, etc.)
Services offered (tax returns, VAT management, payroll, business advisory, etc.)
Legal entity type (freelancers, startups, SMEs, corporations)
How It Works
Search: Enter your business type and required accounting services.
Compare: View a list of accountants tailored to your needs, complete with service details and client reviews.
Connect: Contact the best match and start optimizing your financial operations.
Unlike generic business directories, Cerca Commercialista is built specifically for professionals and entrepreneurs looking for trusted financial experts. We focus on:
Precision: Advanced filters to match accountants with businesses based on expertise.
Efficiency: No more endless searching—find a qualified accountant in minutes.
Transparency: Access clear information about services, pricing, and client feedback.
Who Can Benefit from Cerca Commercialista?
Entrepreneurs and startups looking for financial guidance.
Freelancers needing help with tax compliance.
SMEs and corporations seeking industry-specific accounting expertise.
Accountants who want to grow their client base and increase their online visibility.
Our Mission
At Cerca Commercialista, we aim to simplify and modernize the way businesses connect with financial professionals. By leveraging technology, we help entrepreneurs save time, reduce stress, and make informed financial decisions that drive growth.
Join us in transforming how accounting services are found and accessed in Italy.

name: CodeBeaver
businessDescription: Unit Tests on Autopilot. CodeBeaver highlights bugs and maintains Unit Tests.
tags: devtool, CI, ai agent, github, unit tests, qa, development tool, gitlab, cicd, continuous integration, tests
longBusinessDescription:
CodeBeaver writes and updates your unit tests. Not only that! It highlights bugs in your Pull Requests by running tests and checking out your code. It works natively with GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket. The onboarding takes 2 clicks! We currently help 30k GitHub stars and counting.
It’s Free for 14 days, then it’s $12 a month.  It’s free for open-source projects!
CodeBeaver - Unit Tests on Autopilot
CodeBeaver writes and updates your unit tests. Not only that! It highlights bugs in your Pull Requests by running tests and checking out your code.
It’s like hiring a junior developer who only focuses on unit tests. Free for 14 days, then it’s $12 a month. It works natively with GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket. Two clicks onboarding!
It’s free for open-source projects! We currently help 30k GitHub stars and counting.
How it works?
CodeBeaver is CI + LLM + your code. It runs your tests, check out the results.
It does 3 things:
If a test fails due to a bug in your code, it provides a detailed explanation of where the bug is. Super fast fixing!
If a test needs to be updated since your code changed, it writes an updated test and opens a new Pull Request.
If a test is not covering enough edge cases, or does not exist at all, CodeBeaver writes it and opens a new Pull Request
Why CodeBeaver?
Get the stability of Unit Testing without the hassle
Never maintain Unit Tests again!
Catch bugs with every Pull Request
Automatic edge case addition
Full control: CodeBeaver opens Pull Requests just like other devs in your team do, so you can review
Ship faster with less bugs!
How do I get started?
Go to codebeaver.ai and get a 14-days free trial, no credit card needed.
After that, it’s only $12 a month per developer. Or free if you are open-source!
What about security?
We take the security of your codebase very seriously. We are GDPR and SOC2 compliant. Learn more on our security page.
Frequently asked questions
Wait, won't it commit tests that pass for buggy code?
No. This is because CodeBeaver will write tests based on its understanding of how your function should work, not based on how you implemented it.
For CodeBeaver to have an understanding of your requirements, it's usually enough to write comments at the start of your function describing what it should do. You can check out this Pull Request to see it in action.
I like to write Unit Tests! Does this mean I don't need them anymore?
We like writing Unit Tests as much as you do! CodeBeaver will run and maintain existing tests, as well as extend the ones it finds. So you can go on and write Unit Tests, but you don't have to worry about covering all of the edge cases and all of the functions if you feel like it.
Which LLM models do you use?
We use Claude 3.5 Sonnet by Anthropic for agentic tasks and O3-mini from OpenAI for code generation. They are both GDPR and SOC 2 compliant.
What languages & frameworks do you support?
CodeBeaver is a general-purpose tool that can be used with any language and framework using a configuration file similar to Docker and GitHub Actions.
CodeBeaver will auto-configure itself for the most common frameworks such as Pytest, Unittest, Jest, Vitest, and more.

name: Foodentyco.it
businessDescription: Foodentyco, an award-winning startup recognized by Invitalia, champions the artisanal organic movement as an antidote to industrialized organic farming. Rejecting monoculture and unfair pricing, Foodentyco sources products from small Southern Italian farms, emphasizing crop rotation, biodiversity, and sustainable practices. Its innovative approach includes three dedicated websites for local, national, and international markets, paired with an express delivery service ensuring fresh, high-quality products within 24 hours in Italy and 48 hours across Europe.
longBusinessDescription:
Foodentyco, recognized by Invitalia as one of the most promising startups, is at the forefront of the artisanal organic movement, countering the trend of industrialized organic farming. This movement rejects the principles of monoculture, large-scale farming, and unsupportive pricing, instead embracing the true essence of organic agriculture. By focusing on crop rotation, biodiversity, and mixed farming practices, Foodentyco brings back the authentic spirit of organic farming.
Born in the heart of Southern Italy, a region known for its untouched agricultural excellence, Foodentyco connects small-scale artisanal producers with consumers. The startup emphasizes a short supply chain, often involving just one intermediary between the producer and the end consumer, and sources products locally to support sustainability and fairness in the food industry.
Foodentyco's innovative model includes an online platform split into three segments: a local site serving nearby customers, a national site for Italian consumers, and an international site for European customers. After selecting their desired products and choosing a delivery date, customers benefit from Foodentyco's express delivery service, which ensures fresh and high-quality products are delivered within 24 hours in Italy and within 48 hours across the rest of Europe. This model allows consumers to enjoy the genuine flavors of Southern Italy in a manner that is both convenient and environmentally responsible.

name: AraBat srl
businessDescription: AraBat is a circular economy startup that has implemented “the most cost-effective and sustainable lithium batteries recycling process in the world”. longBusinessDescription: AraBat is a circular economy startup that has implemented “the most cost-effective and sustainable lithium batteries recycling process in the world”. Our innovative hydrometallurgical technology allows to recycle spent lithium batteries through the use of agri-food waste and recover their preicous metal compounds (lithium, cobalt, manganese, nickel, others) without polluting. Our circular business is based on the offer of the strategic recycling service to the batteries manufacturers and the sale of the critical raw materials we recover.Our company is also involved in the development of other circular processes, the production of renewable energy and consultancy activities in the field of the green economy. Sustainability and circular economy are fundamental values in AraBat's corporate strategy. We are looking for investors and new partners!E-mail: [email protected]~AraBat è una startup per l’economia circolare che ricicla batterie al litio esauste recuperandone i metalli preziosi attraverso l’impiego di scarti degli agrumi. AraBat ha implementato il processo di riciclo di batterie al litio più sostenibile e conveniente del mondo.La mission dell’impresa è quella di commercializzare le risorse critiche recuperate, litio-cobalto-nichel-manganese, contribuendo alla transizione sostenibile e all’indipendenza del continente europeo dall’approvvigionamento esterno da altri paesi. Il processo implementato da AraBat è unico e rivoluzionario nel suo genere: trattasi di un processo idrometallurgico alternativo che sfrutta l’azione sinergica dell’acido citrico e degli zuccheri riducenti degli scarti agroalimentari per riciclare le batterie e recuperarne i composti metallici di elevato valore.Siamo alla ricerca di investitori e nuovi partner!E-mail: [email protected]

longBusinessDescription:
"Affittare il proprio immobile richiede in media circa 3 mesi e circa la metà degli inquilini non paga o ritarda l’affitto. Inoltre, massimizzare la rendita del proprio immobile è complesso e richiede esperienza cosi come gestire una locazione tra rapporti con inquilini, manutenzione, burocrazia e tutto il resto. 
FreedHome (www.FreedHome.co) è la prima piattaforma di instant renting che connette i Proprietari ai Property Manager e, grazie alla sua intelligenza artificiale, consente di affittare il proprio immobile alla migliore offerta, nel minor tempo possibile e senza rischi, selezionando il migliore Property Manager a cui delegare la gestione completa della locazione, senza muovere un dito.
FreedHome è una Startup Innovativa con la missione di rendere l’affitto semplice una volta per tutte e trasformare gli immobili in una rendita certa e senza pensieri.
FreedHome è già una realtà conosciuta e utilizzata nel mercato immobiliare italiano: ad oggi conta circa 400 Property Manager affiliati, ha intermediato migliaia di richieste d’affitto e nel corso del 2021 ha l’obbietivo di completare round di finanziamento per circa 2 milioni di Euro (Equity e Debito).
Oltre alla piena validazione del mercato la Startup ha avuto già importanti riconoscimenti istituzionali essendo stata selezionata da Bocconi For Innovation (“B4i”), uno dei migliori programmi di accelerazione in Italia, Digital Magics, principale incubatore italiano e Backtowork per una campagna di Crowdfunding. name: ResilientX Security
businessDescription:
"Supply chain cyber attacks are rising, with SMBs as the weakest link due to limited security budgets. Yet, enterprises still rely on slow, error-prone, and costly manual assessments, spreadsheets, and questionnaires to manage third-party risk. With NIS2, 160,000 European enterprises must now prove robust risk management or face severe penalties, but many are unprepared.
 ResilientX automates Third-Party Risk Management, reducing assessment time by 80% and cutting compliance costs in half. Our platform streamlines vendor evaluations, automates compliance workflows, and provides real-time risk insights, ensuring companies stay secure and compliant at scale. 
 We operate on a license model, with pricing based on the number of vendors assessed. Initially scaling through channel partnerships with resellers and MSPs, we are now driving direct sales through targeted cold outreach and enterprise engagement. In our first year, we generated €150K in revenue and secured investment from top European VCs and the Italian government. Backed by a leadership team with 40+ years in cybersecurity, tech, and VC, including a successful exit in the industry, we’re on track for 3x revenue growth and reaching break-even by mid-year."
tags: Unified Exposure Management, Third-Party Risk Management, Automated Security Testing

tags: Retail, Health & Wellness, Food, E-commerce, B2C
longBusinessDescription:
Swee-thy is the first Health and Sports Nutrition brand Polyols free, Lactose free and with a low glycemic index products.
Our products are designed to treat various increasingly widespread intolerances and pathologies, such as: lactose intolerance (65% of the human population), diabetes (10% of the human population) and problems related to intestinal health (IBS, dysbiosis...) which today affect 10-15% of the human population, percentage which is increasing as a side effect of Covid, as reported from different researches.
 In 2024 with NUHPRO, we've launched 2 new lines FOR ONLY B2B MARKET:
->JUNIOR line, for the treatment and prevention of childhood diabetes, made with a natural and unique prebiotic fiber
->PRO+PRO line, enrich with a heat-resistant patented probiotic to make our products even more performing for gastrintestinal problems
.

businessDescription: ReLearn is an innovative startup created with the aim of using Artificial Intelligence to help companies and municipalities reduce their environmental impact by monitoring the waste they produce. We help companies and municipalities to achieve the Zero-Waste Goal. Thanks to Artificial Intelligence, we collect precise data on the amount of waste produced to make our clients compliant with the sustainability reporting, reducing waste-related CO2 emissions and empowering the community.
longBusinessDescription:
Listed companies, SMEs and those that have committed to being carbon neutral are obliged to report their waste impact. Today, there is no instrument to measure the waste produced, so companies use inaccurate estimation causing high CO2 emissions and inefficiency in waste operation and sustainability strategies. ReLearn is an innovative startup created with the aim of using Artificial Intelligence to help companies and municipalities reduce their environmental impact by monitoring the waste they produce and educating the users. Thanks to NANDO, a plug-and-play sensor powered by AI, ReLearn collects accurate data on the quantity and quality of waste generated each day, calculating the recycling rate (the quality level of waste differentiation), enabling more rigorous sustainability reports and raising awareness among the corporate and city community. Through gamification, in fact, ReLearn provides an engaging communication service that makes it possible for the company to spread more awareness about environmental and waste issues, to its stakeholders.
We want to bring a waste-free lifestyle into everyone's daily routine.

longBusinessDescription:
Newel Health is an innovative company that aims to improve healthcare for patients and doctors through the creation of beautifully designed and clinically validated digital medicine (DM) and digital therapeutic (DTx) solutions.
Born from an investment play by Healthware Ventures, the company has executed a series of strategic acquisitions of early-stage startups which now constitute a portion of its products’ pipeline.
Its team of experts, comprised of professionals in digital, data, behavioral, and scientific fields, have extensive experience in the life sciences industry.
Strategically partnering with pharmaceutical, medical device, and other health and wellness companies allows Newel Health to expand its customer reach and achieve its vision of future health. A long history of industry partnerships and a focus on patient-centricity enables successful outcomes in these shared initiatives.
Newel Health sprints out of the gate with two digital solutions: Amicomed, a Hypertension Control program that helps people lower their blood pressure via analytic insights of longitudinal blood pressure measurements and highly personalized behavioral lifestyle modification programs, and Soturi, a suite of digital services and smart algorithms that personalize and optimize the medication and treatment plans for people living with Parkinson’s disease.
The company actively researches and develops new digital product concepts in additional therapeutic areas with the goal of entering new partnerships and extending its portfolio of DTx solutions.
Newel Health also owns H.Core, a proprietary rapid-development SaMD (medical device software) framework designed to accelerate the design, validation, production, and launch of DM and DTx solutions.

name: 17tons
businessDescription:
"We verify natural carbon removal using cutting-edge technology to measure your impact every step of the way"

17tons is making high quality nature-based investments verifiable and transparent for companies and their stakeholders. We empower business participation in the fight against climate change. Our technology connects companies with planters to measure, monitor and verify nature-based investments like carbon removal.
tags: Carbon removal, Digital MRV, Carbon Offsets
longBusinessDescription:
We provide access to the highest quality carbon removals while giving clients real-time data and permeant verification
Product highlights:
We empower business participation in the fight against climate change. Our technology connects companies with planters to measure, monitor and verify nature-based investments like carbon removal.
Measure
Our trees are equipped with RFID tags to identify the plant’s information and collect its data. We then install smart sensors among networks of trees to monitor air quality and plot health in real time. Together, these systems provide an accurate measurement of how much carbon is removed by each tree.
Monitor
A digital avatar is then created for each tree and linked to the plant’s data source in the field. We use the data from our field systems to quantify each plant’s CO2 removal. Clients can view and manage this data through our simple user dashboard.
Verify
Carbon removal certificates are issued based on the tons of CO2 stored in each tree, and each tree’s data is transferred to the blockchain. This provides an unalterable permanent record for each tree and makes it traceable, thus neutralizing problems related to double-counting emissions.
Product Benefits:
We provide independent and unbiased data provided directly from the field that is accurately and transparently tracked and attributed to relevant stakeholders in a way that enables liabilities and benefits to be correctly identified, valued and managed.
End-to-End
End-to-end carbon removal and verification. We partner with planters to ensure that only the highest quality removals make it onto our platform, and we manage the process every step of the way.
Live Data
Live data on how much carbon is removed by your trees. This data is easy-to-access and can be shared publicly with your investors, employees and customers via the 17tons platform or through our simple APIs.
Proof of Impact
Proof of impact based on data integrity and immutable record-keeping on the blockchain. In an environment where carbon markets and certifications are constantly changing, 17tons offers permanent evidence of your impact for the future.

name: RE49
businessDescription: Italian Sustainable Shoes. Everything we do today is for the children of tomorrow. Handmade in Italy in Circular Economy.
longBusinessDescription:
RE49 
RE: RE-use, RE-cycle, RE-duce
R, means Rescue, Reborn, Revalue
E, means Eco-sustainability, circular Economy, Ethics
49, it’s the beginning of a dream, when our company was founded by Valentino, my great grandfather and the first craftsman and visionary of the Masolini family.
We are dreamers, artists, and artisans, and we are the most sustainable shoe brand in the world, producing unique Made in Italy products, according to the circular economy model. At RE49, slow fashion is more than a vocation, it is our way of life. We love our planet, and we are committed to preserving it, recovering animal-free, vegan materials that are otherwise wasted.
At RE49, the revolution is about leaving a positive footprint, with a 100% sustainable method of production, passing on our know-how and values to new generations. 
All RE49 collections are limited editions, made with the circular economy model, traceable through the Blockchain, and PETA approved vegan. The materials we use in our atelier are at the center of our vision of progress. Their stories inspire the creativity of our artisans: forgotten beach deckchairs and umbrellas of long summers spent on the Riviera become our Mare sneakers, worn-out spinnakers that sailed through Mediterranean waves are reborn in our Sail collection, denim and other waste fabrics are converted into the Jeans and Fabric collections. The style of our shoes is a fusion of casual streetwear and urban chic elements, with a touch of rock in the Spin Tech collection.
We do not fear the passing of time, and we believe in continuity and the infinite ability to reinvent ourselves and our world. Thus, our mission is to repurpose discarded objects and transform them into works of art to be worn with pride, because RE49 shoes are a message of love to our planet, from the moment they are born, to when they are chosen. By YOU.

longBusinessDescription:
Salute in Cloud it's a cloud based healthcare platform that helps chronically ill people to smooth their access with everything that is related on the transportation, storing and managing their clinical records.
Our main focus is to design a user interface that fits the needs of the chronically ill people, that puts the user at the center of the platform and not viceversa.
The possibility, in fact, for the user to be able to manage their medical information (whether blood tests, x-rays, allergy tests..) at your leisure and according to the order you prefer (whether chronological, thematic, etc.) will allow each person an easy management and understanding of their clinical framework. A simple and detailed  interface with the values the user choose to keep in the foreground will make him aware of what are the parameters to be monitored, all within the reach of a simple tap. 
Salute in Cloud, in addition to facilitating the management of person's clinical documentation, will directly increase the availability of the medical information in its possession. By creating an encrypted and secure sharable link that will allow GP, Doctor specialists a faster diagnosis having the individual's family and pathological history at their disposal.

name: PeoplewareAI
businessDescription: We make data-driven AI products, centered on the people, which are designed to be seamlessly integrated into AI-enabled software.
tags: Human-centric AI, behavioral data, emotion detection
longBusinessDescription:
PeoplewareAI is an academic spin-off created by researchers from the COLLAB research group specializing in collaborative software engineering, social computing, affective computing and data science. PeoplewareAI intends to transfer skills and technologies to offer people-centered AI data-driven products to the market, to be integrated into AI-enabled software solutions.
PeoplewareAI's flagship product is BehaViz, an AI product focused on behavioral data, including the recognition of emotions from written texts. One of BehaViz's engines is EMTk, a search toolkit that can recognize not only the polarity of emotion (positive, negative, neutral) from a written text but also the specific emotion: love, joy, surprise, anger, sadness and fear . This allows a user to focus on analyzing specific emotions. The user can also customize the recognition of emotions not only with an annotated dataset different from the basic one but also with a classification model different from the original one. This allows both greater recognition accuracy and greater flexibility of use. BehaViz can be used as a cloud computing service in Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) mode, connecting the service to customer data sources through specific integrations. This allows the user not to have to move their data outside the databases on which they are hosted.

 We do this by deploying small cloud kitchens airside (or in train stations), so passengers can order last-minute meals online and receive them onboard: meals that are local, fresh, and made-to-order.
 This offers passengers a wider food offer and the customer experience they enjoy at home/office, while increasing ancillary revenues for our partners (airlines/train companies), reducing aircraft weight and fuel consumption and eradicating waste."

name: ReLOG3P
businessDescription: ReLOG3P is an Innovative Startup that offer highly innovative services and products with the aim to support the Global Logistics and Supply Chains (end-to-end) so to provide their contribution in the achievement of the UN Agenda 2030 and its Sustainable Development Goals, mainly through the "Responsible and Ethic" use of the technologies typical of the 4th Industrial Revolution (AI, Data Science, Blockchain, quantum computing, etc.) and on the basis of the principles of Security & Privacy by Design.
longBusinessDescription:
Vision
ReLOG3P, Reshaping LOGistics aiming for 3P: People, Planet, Prosperity.
ReLOG3P acts by bringing to the attention of these Stakeholders the fact that Sustainability is not an (exclusive) question of "CO2, Carbon Footprint" or rather a cost center that clashes with the profitability of companies, but also, and above all, must be approached holistically as a concrete rebalancing between social, environmental and economic interests (People, Planet, Prosperity).
Values
•	1st Pillar: technological innovations of the 4th Industrial Revolution (AI, Machine Learning, Data Science, IoT, 5G, Digital Twin, Blockchain, Quantum Computing, etc.), designed and implemented according to the paradigms of "Ethical and Responsible Innovation" and on the basis of principles of "Security & Privacy by Design".
•	2nd Pillar: development and adoption of Standardization, Interoperability, Multimodality and Synchromodality.
•	3rd Pillar: profound cultural change in the Logistics and Supply Chain sector.
•	4th Pillar: universal values such as Integrity and Respect, with a “Duties VS Rights” approach, transparency and collaboration.
We are in the process of building ReACT (ReAccompanying Chain Transformation - One Platform, One Logistic: Collaborate to be Sustainable), the first and only “one-stop-shop" platform in Logistics, collaborative, agnostic, based upon partnership model, through which Logistic's Stakeholders can collaborate, share knowledge, learn, use tools and best practices, improve processes, increase multimodality and security, propose and sell solutions and much more.
Stakeholders will then be able, with ReACT, to make their Business more Resilient and Agile, that is, more Sustainable.
ReACT is composed by 5 different features (services), provided with a Freemium based model:
ReACT Wiki-Logi
THE “All about Logistics one-stop place” for the searching, locating, sharing of ideas, information, knowledge, specialized and specifically designed just for the Global Logistics Ecosystem.
ReACT Academy
Consolidates and group and offer online learning solutions with the aim to allow the Logistics’ workforce to fight its obsolescence, increase knowledge and value for people and businesses.
A specific eye is given to the upskilling, reskilling and lifelong learning platforms tools.
ReACT Processes
Serve the purpose to verticalize on the analysis and improvement of the different Logistics sub-processes (transport modes, actors, etc.): Air, Sea, Rail and Road, Maritime and Intermodal Ports & Hubs, Airports, Logistic Hubs, etc., improving efficiency, effectiveness, safety, agility and reliability, while reducing variability and waste.
ReACT Multimodality
Contributes freight movements to be more efficient through the optimum use of transport modes.
Helps increasing performances, predictability and flexibility of combined transport and solutions, as well as loads consolidation, sharing of assets, and better management of logistics hubs.
ReACT Certify
Allows Logistics businesses and Stakeholders to certify their progress and contribution towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals.

name: Her-Age
businessDescription: At Her-Age we don't rely on peer-to-peer transactions, but we act as a fully controlled marketplace where we take care of everything, from authentication to pricing and shipping, making it a hassle-free profitable experience. Her-Age is the ultimate solution against luxury counterfeits in the pre-owned market and helps opening exclusive closets to a safe controlled blockchain environment. Once you buy an eligible item for NTF, you not only get its physical value, but you can become owner of its NFT. This will allow you to hold on to a virtually eternal worth that will grow independently from the condition of the original piece. You will be able to find all the information in the blockchain regarding your item, including its authentication certificate, proof of ownership and NFT, on a digital wallet.

name: NetZero
businessDescription: NetZero® is a climate venture specialising in long-term carbon removal from the atmosphere. We turn agricultural residues into biochar, a very stable form of carbon. The process is as follows: plants capture carbon during photosynthesis; we extract and stabilise this carbon through a pyrolysis process; the resulting biochar is buried in the soil, safely storing the carbon out of the atmosphere for hundreds of years. This allows us to generate high-quality carbon credits, which also include the many co-benefits provided with our model, such as increased crop yields through biochar use in soils, and production of renewable electricity from the excess energy of pyrolysis. NetZero’s mission is to bring biochar at scale in the tropics - for climate and people, now.

businessDescription: Folks Finance is the leading algorithmic capital markets protocol for lending and borrowing built and operated on top of the Algorand blockchain. Through the lending operations, Folks users can deposit liquidity and start earning a continuous economic return instantly. Through the borrowing operation, the users can request crypto loans by locking deposited funds as collateral. Folks Finance is the result of extensive research and engineering conducted by Blockchain Italia, a blockchain software house strongly focused on Algorand. The protocol innovations include a disruptive economic lending model designed for the soundness and security of the users, and the introduction of unique features such as staking of rewards, safety margins for cryptocurrency pairs, and an innovative liquidity provision system.

Within a flexible partnership framework, we help to start or accelerate the Fintech AI journey, providing platforms, consultancy and end-2-end solutions. Partnering with ATS and AglieLab we support capabilities for most of the elements in the AI value chain.

name: Perfect Food
businessDescription: Why Perfect Food? Because we all are on a journey searching for the perfect food, pity that the recipe is constantly changing. That happens because, unfortunately, perfection does not exist. However, we can improve and, to do so, we need a strategy and actions that are consistent with it. After all, sustainability is not a destination but the journey itself, one Perfect Food can undertake alongside you. Through the most common analytical methodologies, such as life cycle assessment (LCA-Life Cycle Assessment), or strategic, such as materiality assessment, Perfect Food offers consulting services to companies in the agri-food sector so as to face together with them the steps that, from the field to the table, lead to greater sustainability and a better way of communicating it.

name: Plasma Dynamics
businessDescription: Plasma Dynamics StartUp By very powerful team, which includes professors, young scientists and engineers with extensive experience in Plasma Technologies, we will be able to provide the high-quality research, development and manufacturing of any types of Plasma Systems. Our Researches & Developments are: Plasma Gasification/Pyrolysis of Municipal/Medical Solid Waste (MSW) Component Of Integrated Waste Recycling: The main advantage of the proposed Plasma Treatment technology by Plasma Dynamics srl is the absence of combustion (oxidation) in the municipal/medical waste disposal cycle without increasing economical parameters. This sharply reduces the possibility of the formation of hazardous substances such as dioxins, furans, NOx and SOx. This technology makes it possible to obtain zero emissions into the environment through waste processing. Microwave Plasma Filter: The technology is based on the basic properties of microwave plasma, which make it possible to very effectively act on a number of carbon-containing substances, including gaseous ones, from the point of view of their destruction. During this process, dusts and toxic gases are transformed into completely environment friendly components according to U.S. EPA and EU EEA regulation. As United States and European regulations are now focused on reducing Greenhouse gases, mainly Carbon Dioxide (CO2), in Plasma Dynamics srl, we are research and developing the Microwave Plasma Technology to solve this issue. Plasma Engine: Plasma Dynamics Team has great experience in developing of Plasma Propulsion Systems for Space and Defence applications, science-based capabilities in support of the current and future of Plasma Engines related R&D. Multiphysics Simulation: Plasma Dynamics uses advanced FEA, CFD and particle-in-cell (PIC) codes, developed for simulation-based design.
tags: Aerospace, Environmental Engineering, Manufacturing, Mechanical Engineering, Simulation

The platform automates circular processes with a data-driven approach, streamlining circular operations while ensuring traceability of waste flows and reporting of impact KPIs.

Thanks to a network of over 100 circular operators with specific and reliable expertise in recycling, repurposing, and reuse, textile waste can have a second life.

The MustHad solution not only benefits the planet but also serves as a strategic asset for companies to boost efficiency, reduce costs, ensure regulatory compliance, and pursue SDGs.
longBusinessDescription:
MustHad offers an excess inventory management software to scale circularity in fashion.
It is an all-in-one platform automating waste management for brands and textile companies, enabling:
Data digitization: upload excess inventory (e.g., unsold inventory, production waste, returns & take-back) into our data-driven dashboard to gain full control and make informed circular decisions.
Operational control: activate the most suitable circular supply chain by choosing from multiple circular solutions (e.g., recycling, repurposing, reuse) that can handle excess textile materials.
Tracking & measurement: track waste flows and receive tangible data on environmental and social impacts generated.
The solutions activated so far by MustHad thanks to its network of circular operators include repurposing, reuse and recycling practices, which positively impact several aspects of a company, such as the ecological footprint, costs, corporate reputation and operations.
In this way, companies can leverage metrics and data that can be integrated into their sustainability reports and transparently communicated to their stakeholders.

name: TrueScreen
businessDescription: TrueScreen is the Mobile App that allows you to certify all Media content acquired with a Mobile device (such as screenshots, photos, videos, audio, GPS and screen recording), granting it extreme probative value.
tags: legaltech, insurtech, remote inspection, probative value
longBusinessDescription:
TrueScreen is the Mobile App that allows you to certify all Media content acquired with a Mobile device (such as screenshots, photos, videos, audio, GPS and screen recording), granting it extreme probative value.
Using the most advanced technologies, Artificial Intelligence and its own algorithms protected by international patents, TrueScreen analyzes the acquired content, verifying its non-alteration with respect to the original source, altogether with other characteristics related to the acquisition. If the outcome of all these checks is positive, the App delivers a 100% compliant forensic report that can be immediately shared in order to prove that the information is fully trustable. The document is therefore digitally signed, time stamped (by our partner Intesa by IBM, an accredited certification body) and completed with all the technical parameters which are useful to define the context in which the acquisition took place, in accordance with the main international directives in the field of digital preservation.
TrueScreen's goal is to provide anyone with an accessible and technologically advanced tool, becoming a fundamental support in the process of collection of digital evidence in various fields (civil, criminal, administrative and extrajudicial), be that in defense of personal rights (such as cyber-bullying, revenge porn, stalking, online defamation, etc ..) or more broadly to certify an event that may have legal or extra judicial consequences (ex. assessing state of conservation of furniture and buildings, industrial inspections, car accidents etc ..).
TrueScreen has been developed by addressing one main issue: it is increasingly easier to modify all Media content with the aim of manipulating reality. This current high volatility of the online information requires the presence of tools that could crystallize the acquisition of a Media, that is to lock the data around an image or video. By doing so, such a solution carries along the extreme probative value of the information that each user may need to archive for future proof.
This solution integrates specific features both for the B2C world (non-professional users) and for the B2B ecosystem (lawyers and other forensic professionals, professional firms, technical firms, private companies, insurance companies, banks, associations, public administration, utilities and other realities), being this an  useful tool not only to certify the acquisition of contents but above all to safely manage the entire flow of documents.

tags: dental 3D printing, denture bars, software, training
longBusinessDescription:
Hi-Fiber is a fresh Italian brand of smart, quality dental reinforcements powered by the most advanced, patented 3D printing technology for long-lasting, natural bites and smiles. 
Hi-Fiber was developed with dental experts in need of a product durable, easy to use, cost / time efficient, and beautiful. Made with translucent, strong material – continuous, pre-tensioned, unidirectional glass fiber and resin, these new, one-of-a-kind structures offer natural esthetics and bone-like behavior, impressive strength and functionality, and custom fit.
Hi-Fiber is a green, clean, and smart way to reinforce smiles
•	Cuts time and cost of manufacturing and finalization, opacification, sanding, and rework
•	Saves up to 90% of milled dental waste and pollution
•	Uses a fully-digital, predictable workflow
•	Reduces rehabilitation time
•	Guaranteed for life
Hi-Fiber is owned by Moi Dental, a subsidiary of Moi Composites, spin-off of Politecnico di Milano University. Its B2B shop serves dental labs and clinics for custom, ready to use bars delivered to their door.
Hi-Fiber aims to improve the way smiles are made by connecting advanced 3D printing solutions with dental professionals in an easy, convenient, and modern experience. It is UNI EN ISO 10993-5, ISO 13485, European Directive 93/42 / EEC compliant and has successful clinical trials since 2017. 
The project received funding from the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation program under grant agreement No 876313.
Moi Dental is the first and only company in the world able to produce and sell Hi-Fiber products. It includes a network of experts, clinics, laboratories, agents, and partners.

name: EDT PROJECT
businessDescription:
Progetto EDT ENERGY DIFFERENTIAL THERMAL 2020
Innovative nanocoating that is able to produce electric energy from heated surfaces (also from the sun). It produces electricity from thermal differential effect and needs two surfaces at two different temperatures.The coating is transparent, based on nano-particles, and can be easily applied to many materials
longBusinessDescription:
STARTEF srl has developed an innovative coating that is able to produce electric energy from heated surfaces (also from the sun). In detail the nanocoating produces electricity from thermal differential (Seebeck/Peltier) effect and needs two surfaces at two differenti temperatures.The coating is transparent, based on nano-particles, and can be easily applied to:
glass windows and doors: the nanocoating, being a transparent thermal conductor, turns out to be completely safe if applied to these materials, transforming the windows into real electricity generators exploiting the difference between the inner and outer surfaces of the glass ;
photovoltaic modules: the efficiency of commercial photovoltaic panels does not exceed 20% due to overheating problems. With the application on a photovoltaic panel of this coating, the EDT- layer does not affect the conversion of light into electricity, given the transparency of the layer itself, and also manages to cool the panel by increasing its efficiency to 40% and producing electricity using the subtracted heat;
Insulation modules for thermal coats: These modules are used as external or internal covering of buildings and apartments to increase their energy efficiency and reduce heat loss. If the surface of these panels were coated with EDT, the difference in temperature between the inside of the house and the outside could be exploited to produce electricity, in addition, by converting the heat into electricity, it prevents the passage between inside and outside, thus improving thermal insulation;
Customized support for energy recovery at an industrial level: large industries are increasingly interested in energy saving and are increasingly adopting solutions that allow them to use energy at a lower cost. Covering metal panels with EDT-layers, in order to create customizable modular structures capable of capturing heat and converting it into electricity, could lead these companies to self-produce part of the electricity required at a very competitive price.
With the creation of the smart window as well as having a system capable of producing energy from the thermal differential (external and internal temperature), inserted in a domotic system it can act as an alarm system, since EDT is a thermal detector. It can also detect anomalous presences of people, for surveillance and security.
The The SME is open for collaboration with companies, research centres and universities for partnering in research projects.
Moreover, preferred partners are private companies for the following cooperations:
license agreement: licensing for the use of the application;
commercial agreement with technical assistance: the partner should provide to the company all the information about its requirements in order the company to set up a customized product
partening in collaborative research funded projects
Advantages & innovations
The advantages of the EDT-nanotechnology coatings are:
energy saving and energy efficiency
improvement of environmental climate sustainability ra
tional use of renewable energy sources,
implementation with safety and transport systems,
efficiency improvement in smart agriculture,
smart mobility, smart cities sectors, ships, trains, aerospace systems.
All customers falling into these categories can take advantage of EDT technology to increase the added value of their products, make them more efficient and competitive within a global business landscape. The practical energy saving solution, at low cost, does not request for aesthetic changes or spaces suitable for installations. As for an exemplum: a coating of about 1800 nanometers is transparent at visible ligth between 380-750 nanometers and with a temperature difference of 10 °C is able to produce 550W/square meter.

The RONIN AI Platform® uses its proprietary technologies to add context to data and incorporates self-learning capabilities to deliver turnkey solutions to major global corporations in the power, energy, metal manufacturing, insurance and transportation industries.
Founded in 2020, Seetalabs is a worldwide distributed startup, headquartered in Turin (Italy), and serves its customers through online pipelines and offline contact nodes in Italy, Japan, France, Australia, Israel, Colombia and India.
Since its inception, Seetalabs has focused in developing cutting edge solutions to solve important energy related challenges and reliability. RONIN AI is our cloud platform for the real-time calculation and health monitoring of large power transformers to prevent abrupt power outages due by machine faults and to predict manufacturing power needs.
RONIN AI is a unique digital predictive maintenance solution shifting popular health indexing approach into a scientific and validated machine learning model.

Some examples: - Documents issued by a body attesting a quality: e.g. degree, the university creates (or uploads) the certificate on the platform and sends it to the graduate. - Documents issued by an entity and which can pass from hand to hand: e.g. guarantee certificates or bearer bonds.
