name: 3D.I.V.E
businessDescription:
Overcoming the boundaries of visual space. Converting 2D video and image contents into 3D suspended in air.
The technologies proposed to obtain three-dimensional effects require screens or operate at very high frequency and the too high "frame rate" is tolerated by the user only for a few moments.
3D.I.V.E on the contrary really shows 3D objects floating in the air without any screen at the "frame rate" of usual video projections.
longBusinessDescription:
Let's start from the idea if we look for a three-dimensional image, we don't actually need a surface where projecting films. Our system allows to project images or videos from a normal display. The projection will be three-dimensional and suspended in air.
- A realistic view in 3D Virtual Reality without using media display
- For the incomparable spectacular effect
- For distance communication (conferences, videophone, distance learning)
- For the incredible effect of the image presence of the interlocutor and / or object remotely
- A new low-cost technology allowing revolutionary vision systems
Switching from two-dimensional to three- dimensional display systems 3D projection devices
-FOR VIDEO CONFERENCE 01APPLICATION - The system communicates via WiFi with smartphone, tablet or personal computer and it's able to project a 3D image of the person in the videoconference in the air;
-FOR SMARTPHONE, TABLET OR PERSONAL COMPUTER - The device intended as an external accessory projects the image or part of it of the 2D display of the smartphone, tablet or personal computer as 3D enlarged image in the air;
-3D projection devices able to INTERFACE WITH MECHANICAL, OPTICAL AND SANITARY DESIGN SOFTWARE The device reproduces in the air 3D images of mechanical, optical project or x-ray or other images.
POINT ONE:
Main use limit: need for a screen, there is no image projection in the unbordered air.
POINT TWO:
Projection of images in the air but confined in a hole with walls of a certain type: technology used only for board games.
POINT THREE:
The only technologies that allow projecting floating images in the absence of screens or wearable accessories offer the user a "frame rate" of projection of 5,000 hertz with a result of poor tolerability by the user's eye.

name: latitudo40
businessDescription:
Latitudo 40 is an innovative start-up that combines the skills and expertise of a large company with the passion and ability to innovate of a lean organization that bases its success on the principles of user centered design. Enhancing the experiences of its founders in the ICT and Earth Observation fields, gained in university research contexts and in large companies, and the background of experience, skills and abilities of our multidisciplinary team, the company offers integrated solutions of geo-information in the cloud, based on images from earth observation satellites and innovative algorithms of artificial intelligence, machine learning and big data analysis.
In Latitudo 40 we strongly believe in the value that can be extracted from the images coming from earth observation satellites and we have made our utmost efforts to launch the EarthAlytics platform on the market which is able to transform pixels into information using an innovative and multi-sensor approach in a simple, effective and rapid manner in different application fields. We use a multi-sensor approach,  putting together in a single application platform data coming from the satellites, IOT devices installed in the field and from sources external to the organization (weather forecasts, statistics, erp, etc.). We process these data through artificial intelligence and machine learning to give them meaning and provide the needed information to make the right decisions at the right time, without having to be experts in earth observation.
Latitudo 40 is incubated within the Business Incubator Center of the European Space Agency Business Incubation Center at the BIC LAZIO in ROME. The headquarter office is based in Naples

name: Venezia Autentica
businessDescription:
Venezia Autentica is an impact-driven startup leveraging digital media & tech as well as cultural tourism to increase the retention of tourism revenue in urban destinations while improving visitors' experience. We do so to halt the impoverishment and displacement of the local residents and consequently preserve unique cultures, heritages, and ways of life. We are currently piloting and active in Venice, Italy and planning on expanding to other cities suffering from the problem of over-tourism. 
Our work and expertise have been featured over 60 times in major international publications such as BBC, ABC, National Geographic Traveler, Arte TV, Conde Nast Traveler and more.
Concretely, we make it easy and fun for visitors to have an authentic experience of their destination while making a positive impact on the local community, mainly by supporting vetted local businesses and associations through services (on-demand service, experiences, loyalty scheme) and tools (certified local businesses directory) they can respectively buy and find for free on our website.

name: B2BOOK
businessDescription:
B2Book is a B2B Vacation Rentals platform between tourist accommodation owners or managers (Seller) and travel agencies, tour operators, Online Travel Agents (OTA) and GDS (Buyer). The platform was born with the aim of filling the gap that was created due to the B2C product distribution concentration of the holiday home product in the hands of large global OTAs (Airbnb, Booking, HomeAway, Tripadvisor).
Vacation Rentals offer managed by the biggest OTAs has in fact excluded the professional operators (Travel Agents, Tour Operators, Online Travel Agents OTAs) from the distribution process of the Vacation Rentals product, which is now only available with uncompetitive commissions compared to the hotel product in just a few B2C portals.
Through B2Book API integrations, tourist accommodation can be promoted on innumerable new portals and countless new players (like also Airlines Companies), many of which can rely on a much larger user pool than a simple OTA sector.

HI is the only comprehensive digital solution designed to foster technology adoption with features to aid both businesses and individual employees. HI translates insights from research on psychology and change management into a contextual, personalized, and just-in-time action-based programme.

It is easier (and funnier!) than ordering a coffee: agronomist will support you for the all growing process and our App will choose the perfect medicinal plant for your office-ache!

We're in strong synergy with the most common social media but we're completely independent. We create a personal, emotional and unique communication between fans and stars during and after sports and music live events.

name: LoanXchain
businessDescription: LoanXchain (LXC) is a FinTech startup aiming at revolutionizing the secondary market for loans in Europe, by leveraging the power of enterprise blockchain to simplify trusted interactions. This solution solves any stakeholders compelling needs, increasing transparency, liquidity, and diversification while cutting transaction time/ cost and facilitating market participation for smaller financial players. Considering the loan as raw material, LXC allows lenders to optimize the loan warehouse, in order to dynamically manage their capital and liquidity needs. This approach enables lenders to adjust their credit production process on investors purchase intentions as well as fostering just in time credit production and distribution processes.

name: Replave
businessDescription:
Replave is the first Social Network that allows you to get feedback and advice on each daily choice you are going to make.
I.E. You are in a changing room trying on some dress and you share some selfie with your friends group on Replave. The App will immediately notify your friends preferences and the most voted one, just like they were here with you!
There are unlimited daily circumstances to use this App: what gift should you choose for a mutual friend, what movie youd like to see at the cinema, which exhibition is worth to be visited or whats next holiday location.
Replave is the first App for socializing choices.
How does it work?
It is a Social Network accessible by Mobile App.
Every user can access it through username and password, or through Facebook login.
The App allows you to involve publicly or privately- your contacts, by asking an opinion, advice or vote on the choice you are about to make.
Replave is easy, funny, useful, fast. Basically you type a question, you take 2 or 3 pictures, you decide the deadline for votes submission and you choose the recipients among your friends getting immediately a
recap with the most popular option.

name: Ernestopro.com
businessDescription:
Ernesto is the website connecting customers with professionals for over 1.000 service categories.
With a user-friendly interface, customers can easily search and compare professionals based on ratings, reviews, and prices to make it easier to find the right match for their needs. As a market leader in the service marketplace industry, Ernesto's mission is to make services accessible and affordable for everyone.
From plumbing to wedding planning, Ernesto offers a wide range of services to cater to the diverse needs of its customers.
longBusinessDescription:
Customers provide detailed posts for potential jobs (e.g. home remodeling, plumbing, seeking electricians or painters, etc.).
Interested professionals use the platform to bid on those jobs by detailing a price and description of their services.
Customers then compare professionals based on price, customer reviews, and other elements of the bids.
Customers finally hire the right professional for the job.
Ernesto has over 100.000 projects requested every year in over 500 different categories. The company operates in Italy, UK, and the US and has over 130.000 professionals on its platform.
Platforms like Ernesto, aimed at fulfilling consumer service requests are becoming increasingly attractive to these small business owners since these platforms generally involve a minimal investment of time or money on the part of the local merchant.
Rather than paying upfront for advertisements that may or may not generate actual leads, business owners can sit back and wait for leads to come to them.
Which problem is Ernesto solving for Local Professionals?
In general, Customers can easily find professionals but professionals often have trouble finding customers. So Ernesto provides a fair marketing tool that allows professionals to find key customers in a less costly and more efficient way.
Many professionals are not happy with current methods to promote their business online because they are spending too much money for too few results!
In fact, using technologies like Google Adwords in this market they risk to spend up to €17 per click on their website which is not even a lead. Meanwhile using other websites they spend up to 100 € per lead and most of the time customers don’t even answer back.

businessDescription: Eatsready is the marketplace for mobile ordering. Discover the best restaurants, browse menus, pay & collect using our fast-track technology.
longBusinessDescription:
Eatsready is a European based startup, founded by an enthusiastic team passionate about retail, food and digital payments - with the aim to innovate and revolutionize the everyday classical way to consume and buy any product. Our mission is to create a better everyday life experience for shoppers and retailers.
We are passionate about enhancing the offline shopping experience for online and mobile customers - we support brick-and-mortar retailers to satisfy more clients through the digitization process.
Eatsready is the marketplace for mobile ordering. A mobile-first service where users can discover the best local restaurants, browse menus, pre-order and pay, receive premium offers, collect using our fast-track technology.
Many other segments are looking to implement mobile ordering solutions to their services. For instance, Eatsready has just signed a partnership with the Candy Arena to allow Volleyball Premiere League fans to order-ahead, pay and receive their orders delivered to their seats. This wait-free experience is attracting major players from different dynamics, including: airports, mobility-solution services, train stations and shopping malls.
Joining the Eatsready community is easy and free, try the app on the Apple Store, Google Play Store or Web.

name: Casavo
businessDescription:
Casavo – The largest South European Instant Buyer. 

Casavo is Italy’s first “instant buyer”, offering tremendous value to both sellers and buyers of residential real estate in Southern Europe. Casavo is addressing a critical pain point in the property marketplace by significantly reducing the time it takes to transact. On average, it takes seven months to sell a residential property through the traditional channels in Italy’s main cities. However, Casavo simplifies the process, allowing sellers to avoid the hassles and uncertainties associated with the different phases of the sale process. Casavo achieves this by stepping in as a direct buyer.  The company’s automated valuation system takes into consideration dozens of variables and provides potential sellers with the exact value of their property and an immediate purchase offer in real time. After accepting the offer, Casavo carries out a free inspection of the property, while the seller receives the full payment within a matter of days. 

As we grow at the speed of light, we are always looking for exceptional talents to pursue and share our mission. Business-driven mindset, groundbreaking creativity and the highest integrity are the keys to join a team of amazingly talented engineers, analysts and disruptive marketers.

name: HPA â High Performance Analytics
businessDescription:
HPA is an innovative startup that comes from the passion and skills of a team of mathematicians, data scientists and developers with the aim of providing the market with algorithms capable of improving the performance of decision-making systems adopted by companies in every commodity sector. From January 2019, HPA is an accredited spin-off of the University of Verona. 

The team's competences cover all areas of predictive analysis, with particular reference to the analysis and development of models for the prediction, over time, of complex dynamics. The techniques used, the result of the research work developed by the team members, constitute an innovative mix of statistical-inferential approaches, continuous stochastic analysis and approaches based on Machine Learning and Neural Networks.
tags: predictive analytics, predictive maintenance, forecasting, machine learning
longBusinessDescription:
Compared to the classic off-the-shelf solutions on the market, which use mathematical models and obsolete data analysis technologies, HPA makes scientific research and custom work on customer data, the strengths with which we have succeeded in a short time to make us appreciate on the market - both operating directly with the company and through system integrators - in different sectors:
* Energy: forecasting of the production of electricity from renewable sources (photovoltaic, wind), consumption forecasting, energy trading (bidding).
* Physical security: anomaly detection on the alarm signals of thousands of offices for the identification of false positives and the correct routing of the alarm to the responsible operator.
* Manufacturing: fault detection, predictive maintenance on household appliances and numerical control equipment.
* E-commerce: pricing optimization and churn prediction for GDO and B2B players.

name: Epiphany
businessDescription: Epiphany is a start-up company, founded in 2016, which operates in the technology sector with a special focus on banking. Learn more at: www.epiphany.eu/
longBusinessDescription:
In a changing world, the banks who will survive are not the strongest but the most adaptable to change. Today everything about this market is evolving and consumer expectations keep rising, technology improves hourly, new tech-savvy entrants emerge from everywhere, and new regulations challenge banks to stay relevant in the eyes of customers.
Founded in 2016 by Paolo Spadafora and Eddy Moretti, Epiphany brings to market a full-stack digital banking platform. Comprised of a rich set of micro-services, and a catalogue of ready-to-use apps, this platform aims at enhancing and extending core banking systems into the new and complex world of open banking.
Epiphany’s Full Stack Digital Banking Platform and related services support banks, system integrators, service providers and FinTechs, including certified TPPs, with a comprehensive, ready-made digital platform, that fully enables accelerated time to market for new services, or complements any PSD2 or Open Banking stack and/or strategy already in place.
The platform helps banks bridge from non-revenue generating PSD2 investments, into a full Open Banking, revenue-generating stack, enabling the delivery of new and accretive services, through engaging, high-value, human experiences, today.

longBusinessDescription:
b-more is born with the desire to rediscover local shopping to consumer.
We link the shop owners through the innovative use of traditional instruments, to reach new customers and retain existing ones.
The b-more's loyalty system, use the "Tax Code" present on the Healt Card, a document always available to every consumer.
The circuit was created to facilitate the needs of visibility of the local shops, divided into eight categories. Clothing, Food, Catering and Hospitality, Technology, Healt, Home, Sport and Culture, and finally in Luxury and Precision.
The shops are equipped with a WebApp and a Card Reader Bluetooth, to be able to charge points to their clients.
The system provides for a division of the points: 90% remain in the store where you shop and 10% instead of the b-more circuit.
When a customer wants to withdraw the prize supplied from the store, you can use all the points of the store, or a part of them together with those of the circuit.

Our main cloud services is Legal EyeTM PRO; it's an innovative ICT cloud solution in the area of fight against cybercrime, allowing professionals as well as private people to automatically, quickly and efficiently collect, in real time, the e-evidence of cybercrime that has 100% guaranteed admissibility in court proceedings.

The collected data is encrypted and timestamped, accompanied with a whitepaper (set of technical and legal documents with which LEYE is compliant with).

name: Caracol

name: Chino.io

tags: Cyber Security, Health Care, Information Technology

name: respectlife
businessDescription:
Antimicrobial and antifungal textile could significantly reduce the risk of deadly hospital-acquired
infections
longBusinessDescription:
Healthcare-associated infections are complications of healthcare that result in elevated patient morbidity and mortality.
The WHO report explores the burden of HAIs in the high-income countries, the prevalence of HAIs in Europe is around 7.1% with more than 4 million patients affected by approximately 4.5 million episodes of HAIs annually and leading to 16 million extra-days of hospital stay, 37,000 attributable deaths and contributing to an additional 110,000.
Linen, uniforms, drapes RespectLife intrinsically bacteriostatic and antifungal PP textile could significantly reduce the risk of deadly hospital-acquired infections.
Health: PP is compatible with living tissue; in surgical is it used inside the human body for aortic stents and hernia repair.
Sustainable: The production of PP is the economic and ecological of all the fiber production processes minimize CO2 emissions, no water, no soil, no chemicals additives and longer lifecycle. Soap and cold water for washing. Less energy to dry. 100% Recyclable.
Ethical: Increase workers safety standards. Reduce chemicals and infectious agents’ hazards, back injuries, pulmonary diseases and fire in weaving industries.

name: Apio
businessDescription: Apio is an ICT company that provides Smart and Connected solutions that allow you to innovate your company and your business. All Apio solutions are delivered through ApioOS, a Web Operating System capable of translating the mass of data coming from connected objects into useful services for your business.
tags: Internet of things, Industrial IoT, Smart Object

name: Salient Eye
businessDescription:
Your Android device is 3 clicks away from becoming a home security alarm system.

The Salient Eye application uses your phone's camera to sense motion and makes alarm sounds when a break-in occurs. Salient Eye home security app catches intruders red-handed and immediately sends you pictures via email and SMS.
tags: Alarm System, Home Security, Sense Motion

name: Tourist Menu

name: NexToMe
businessDescription: Nextome is leader in indoor positioning. It localizes, guides and tracks users and asset with a simple to install, ready-to-use and low cost solution.
tags: indoor location, gpsindoor, asset tracking, indoor navigation
longBusinessDescription:
Nextome is a software technology company born with global ambition that tackles the challenges of indoor navigation. Since our first steps, we have travelled around the world to benchmark our technology, meet potential customers and participate in international competitions. The start-up, founded by passionate computer science students, is based in Puglia, Italy. After years of research and development on the indoor positioning and navigation system, the company won multiple awards and international innovation challenges.
Our Technology
The patented technology utilizes smartphone sensors and low-signal Bluetooth beacons leveraged by a physical model as well as A.I. algorithms to achieve remarkable results. In a highly competitive market the solution stands out due to a high accuracy (1-2 meter), great value and simple installation approach (no fingerprinting) that makes the system ready to use almost right away. Besides the indoor positioning, navigation and asset tracking system, Nextome provides tools to manage the infrastructure and analyse the data in real-time. The patented Nextome indoor location and navigation system is designed to be integrated into an existing mobile application effortlessly. Furthermore, we also offer to customize your new app containing the Nextome Technology plus individual, valuable features.

name: evway
businessDescription: Evway, an app developed to promote electric mobility, is Route 220 best advocate to its commitment to a better future.
tags: Electric Vehicles, Charging, Mapping Services, Tourism, Sustainability, Navigation, Roaming
longBusinessDescription: The evway App provides a complete and interactive mapping of all charging stations in Europe, together with the mapping of the nearby points of interest and facilities. The map becomes a way to give visibility and to promote all facilities that offer the ev-drivers the charging service. To improve the Customer Experience, evway developed eMX, the first navigator for EV-Drivers. Thanks to interoperability with other networks, the evway App allows to manage the charge on more than 120.000 European points. The service is already present in some Asian countries and in the US.

Xceed Nightgraph, on the side, is a cloud based platform that helps clubs target and engage a specific audience, track conversions and increase profits through online & mobile sales and promotion.

Lastly, Xceed is taking over the information business by linking the B2B and B2C side of the nightlife industry, providing real time analytics and addressing the untapped Big Data space in the market.

businessDescription:

Thanks to this web service, which can be integrated into the main git hosting services (such as GitHub and BitBucket), developers have access to a single working area where they can manage the history of events relating to each and every development project.
Its simple interface allows the user to follow the work progress more easily, since he/she no longer needs to have technical information capabilities in understanding the complex interface of a Source Code Management software.

In addition, each project has a dedicated dashboard, which shows all the events that occurred related to the project, whether they are deploy, code changes or any other event.

name: You Are My Guide
businessDescription: We help you to reduce costs and improve the results of marketing and sales strategies thanks to the proprietary semantic system and dedicated AI algorithms.
longBusinessDescription:
Companies of all sizes increase their budgets every day with the goal of reaching new customers. But marketing and sales strategies often proceed by trial and with uncertain results.
Companies do not know what to communicate to attract and retain customers and their strategy is often repetitive and random.
The problem is perceived both by medium-sized companies, which do not have the technological resources and the internal professional figures suitable to make processes efficient by enabling competitiveness with large companies, both by large companies, often with an organization in silos that do not allow interoperability.
You Are My Guide has therefore created GhostWriter, AI-powered Marketing Strategy platform. GhostWriter saves companies the hours of work and the hundreds of thousands of euros that invest in trying to understand WHAT IS THE TARGET of their sales and WHAT TO COMMUNICATE to better sell and retain customer loyalty.
GhostWriter reduces costs by boosting some marketing and sales figures and making them redundant. Ensures efficiency by combining virtual professions that are the key to the success of marketing innovation.

name: Orange fiber

You can access it directly with your Facebook account and it's available also as a Facebook game, completely integrated in it. We've yet available 9 soccer championships, NBA basket, NFL football and tennis.

name: Filo

Over 500,000 users have accessed our platform, resulting in over 1.3 million accesses.

This Visual Insights System, in collaboration with our team of behavioural specialists, assists our clients in understanding and analysing real human behaviours and patterns in the areas and places where they occur, providing unique analytics and insights.

The branding solutions are developed to set hyper-targeted and geo-located campaigns to improve engagement and maximize the effectiveness of the message.
We are a team of tech lovers, mobile-addicted, smart and fun people working together every day in our four offices located worldwide.

Being part of Instal team means constantly working to meet clients' business goals while keeping a user-centered approach. It also means supporting each other, cooperate and share backgrounds and expertise, have fun together while breathing mobile and constantly get opportunity for growth

For the advantage of our customers, we assist them in creating a world where all processes perform to their maximum capacity and no resources are squandered unnecessarily.
Joining Tau Group gives you the opportunity to work on projects all over the world in a demanding and rewarding environment. At all levels, we strive for excellence, and each and every member of our team plays a role in shaping the company's future.
tags: Automotive, Clean Energy, Electric Vehicle, Manufacturing, Renewable Energy, Transportation

name: Xnext
businessDescription:
Xnext is a knowledge-intensive scale-up company that manufactures and develops the most advanced inspection technologies for in-line real-time material characterization: XSpectra® identifies contamination, foreign body, or flaw in food manufacturing in milliseconds, performs Non Destructive Testing, and correctly distinguishes different types of material in recycling.
XSpectra® is a brand new generation of X-ray technology that can function at higher energy levels than the conventional 1 or 2 levels, up to 1.024.
XSpectra® discovers a new class of flaws and impurities that are otherwise undetectable by current technologies, such as light materials for foreign body identification in Food and Pharma safety inspections, thanks to its innovative and patented multi-energy analysis.

name: RoxyApps

More than 100,000 customers have already taken advantage of our applications to handle their tasks related to editing, compressing, converting, sharing and processing files of various types.
Roxy's software for document conversion, viewing and editing are available through Windows Store, Google Play and App Store.

name: Meritocracy
businessDescription:
Meritocracy was born 4 years ago with the clear vision to make job seeking an insightful and rewarding experience. We offer to our users an engaging journey to explore proprietary photo-video content about the most game-changing companies in Europe and we use data on recruiters choices to give them information about their likelihood to succeed. 
Our company is growing everyday: almost 350 companies decided to join our mission and more than 100,000 users are enrolled on our platform. These numbers are growing everyday, and we already have a base in Berlin, a very innovative city for startups and digital companies.
longBusinessDescription:
Meritocracy was born 4 years ago with the clear vision to make job seeking an insightful and rewarding experience. We offer to our users an engaging journey to explore proprietary photo-video content about companies and we use data on recruiters choices to give them information about their likelihood to succeed. 
Were currently working with almost 350 companies among which Tetra Pak, Flixbus, Kreditech, Samsung, Mondadori, Decathlon, Casper and Foodora. As our customer base grows (and we are currently over 100,000 users), we are always in need to engage bigger audience: however, to keep our brand positioning, we carefully screen every source of traffic to make sure to match our customers needs in a coherent and professional way. These numbers are growing everyday, and we already have a base in Berlin, a very innovative city for startups and digital companies. 
We give our users precious, original and different insights into game-changing companies, thanks to our dynamic and exploratory videos, photos and colorful descriptions. We also started to do Facebook Live to show the inside of the companies, and we are the first to do that. Our content is very keen on giving value to our mission, and we started collaborating on our blog with professionals about every topic that may concern and interest the job world.
We believe we can make a difference in the job-hunting process, by giving users the chance of stepping into Europe's most innovative companies.

name: Buzzoole
businessDescription: It allows brands to integrate key influencers into their digital and social communications in a fully automated, transparent and ROI-driven approach. The Tabero Digital Concierge replaces all conventional slips, flyers, beverage and menu cards, as well as information about the surroundings. All content and information can be quickly and easily changed, without paper and printing costs.

name: CharityStars
businessDescription:
CharityStars is a groundbreaking fundraising platform for nonprofit organizations that offers one destination for all - Auctions, Buy Now, Sweepstakes and Event/Gala Technology.  

At CharityStars, we are charities, influencers, brands and individuals. We have causes and dreams on the brain. We are doers, givers and donors. 

Our goal is to make giving fun and rewarding. Winners get the chance to live a dream, celebrities, brands and private donors support causes they are passionate about, and charities spend less time fundraising and more time creating positive change.

name: Pedius
businessDescription: Pedius is a communication system that allows deaf people to make normal phone calls. Use it in your everyday life to make important calls such as booking doctors appointments or making reservations, or to call family, friends and coworkers.
tags: eHealth, Disabilities, Accessibilities, Communication, Healthcare, Pedius, Rome
longBusinessDescription:
Once you download the smartphone app you can start a conversation by either typing or speaking a message. The recipient will listen on their end and reply, and you will immediately read a transcription of what he or she just said.
Pedius gives you the freedom to have real-time conversations when you need to call a plumber, book a table at your favourite restaurant, or talk to your doctor.
Pedius also offers companies the chance of enabling accessible phone services to their deaf customers.

name: Smiling Srl
CoContest
businessDescription: Cocontest is a crowdsourcing platform for all those end users in need of new design ideas or projects for renovating their house/office. Architects compete in design contests with cash rewards and specifications set by end users. Cocontest is useful also for companies in the real estate market as a new outsourcing channel for low cost projects. It is especially a great opportunity for junior architects who want to emerge..
tags: Crowdsourcing Platform, Design Ideas, Design Contest

name: Fitboard
businessDescription: Fitboard connects fitness enthusiasts and professionals giving them tools, motivation and opportunities to achieve their goals.
tags: Social Network, Fitness, Sports Motivation Platform

name: Jobbydoo.it
businessDescription:
Jobbydoo.it helps employers hire job seekers in Italy. Their services include a job board, a recruiting platform, career advice and resources to help job seekers build their perfect career.

Jobbydoo also hosts a comprehensive salary database.

name: Tannico
businessDescription: Tannin is a project created by a team of web experts with a common passion for good wine. Every day we select carefully the best Italian and foreign cellars, and each bottle is tasted by our team of winemakers. If Tannico was a wine would have an attractive bouquet and a mixed blend, with great adaptability while maintaining its recognisability.

name: Stamplay
mangatar
businessDescription:
Mangatar is a role-playing social game set in a manga universe. Shape all the avatars you want giving them unique identities. Take a side, join a group, accomplish missions and improve your mangatars' skills in a social way.

Your friends are an essential part of the game: involve them, even from facebook, to empower your team. Explore the mangatar universe: in each "place" you can find special elements to customize your avatars and powerful objects for your missions. Define your own strategy and challenge other players through one-to-one fights or epic group clashes.

The whole experience is in your browser and your iPad thanks to the state of art of web technologies, the coolest avatar generator ever made and the awesome manga illustrations.

name: Vivocha
businessDescription: Established in 2012, and already serving 80+ clients worldwide amongst which ING Bank, Nectar, Save the Children, and many more top brands, Vivocha is an award-winning, and growing startup with offices in San Francisco, Milan, and Cagliari; Vivocha provide a cloud-based online customer interaction platform enabling businesses to seamlessly and proactively communicate with prospects and customers directly on their own websites, using any combination of VoIP, video, chat, callback, and collaboration tools like assisted browsing and form and document sharing: up in less than 5 minutes, Vivocha’s platform helps increase online conversion rates and online customer satisfaction via significant improvements in online customer experience.

name: marinanow
businessDescription: Marinanow is a booking portal that allows users to reserve spaces in marinas throughout the world using an automated online system.

name: AppsBuilder
businessDescription:
AppsBuilder: The easiest way to build your mobile presence

AppsBuilder (www.apps-builder.com) is the innovative Internet startup that allows companies and professionals to build their mobile presence in an easy and intuitive way, and reach a wider audience. 

Thanks to its do-it-yourself platform, AppsBuilder allows any user with no coding skills to create, manage and distribute their own apps through several promotional channels. AppsBuilder’s distribution channels comprise QR codes, landing pages, social networks integration and app store submission.

AppsBuilder’s services also include several CRM tools for independent professionals and SMEs to consolidate client retention through mobile apps and engage users in brand activities. For example, push notifications to communicate with users; geolocalized couponing to market sales and promotions; and form generators to gather users’ details and generate new leads.
Advanced analytics is also provided to monitor applications’ rates and trends and assess marketing campaigns’ performance.

Thanks to AppsBuilder’s cloud-based system, users can add new content and refresh layout anytime they want, then preview changes in real time. In just a few clicks, they can synchronize their website content with their app, so to offer their users a satisfying up-to-date mobile experience!

In a nutshell, AppsBuilder is the fastest and most cost-effective solution to create and distribute apps, and reach new customers on the go.

name: FileRock
businessDescription:
FileRock is a cloud storage service that gives you complete security for your files. We offer complete confidentiality and efficient integrity check, that allow you to keep your data safe from tampering and from unauthorized access. The service is aimed at professionals and small enterprises, who need a secure cloud solution to back up their critical business files and access them from different devices.

The main protection of FileRock consists in:
- Full confidentiality, via zero-knowledge encryption,
- Efficient data integrity check, thanks to a patented technology developed and owned by FileRock,
- Transparency: FileRock Client is released with an open-source license (GPLv3).

name: Talent Garden
businessDescription:
Talent Garden is the place where digital and technology professionals work, learn and connect.

Founded in Brescia, Italy, in 2011, Talent Garden is Europe's leading innovation platform and coworking network for digital innovation. Today Talent Garden has 23 campuses in 8 countries (Albania, Austria, Denmark, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Romania, Spain) hosting thousands of talented people, including startups, freelancers, companies and large corporations.

Talent Garden's mission is to create local, vibrant, globally connected campuses that empower digital & tech communities. 

Talent Garden was founded with the aim of creating an ecosystem that would connect, support and grow the best startups and communities in technological and digital arenas and contribute to the professional development of future global innovators.
tags: Co-Working, Events, Learning, Innovation, TAG, Talent Garden, Milan
longBusinessDescription: Since its launch in 2011, Talent Garden has positioned itself as the best place in Europe for technology and digital professionals. This result was also achieved thanks to the inclusion in the share capital, in 2016, of TIP - (Tamburi Investment Partners) and its network, which includes some of the most important European business families. Supporting Talent Garden there are also large international investors like Endeavor Catalyst, an American fund backed by Linkedin founder Reid Hoffman, which sustains the best digital companies globally. Talent Garden, which closed a 12 million euro capital increase in 2016, is one of the fastest growing companies in Europe, and collaborates with major partners such as Google, Cisco, BMW, Fondazione Agnelli, leading banks in Italy and overseas, institutions and other companies in the Fortune 500 ranking.

name: MotorK
businessDescription: MotorK is a leading automotive sales and marketing technology company in Europe. MotorK is a software company providing in-cloud solutions to automotive car manufacturers, dealers and final customers.

name: Treedom
businessDescription: Treedom is the first platform that allows consumers and corporations to celebrate and contribute to environmental commitment, planting trees and following their impact online. It’s a smart, simple way to make a big difference, supporting the environment and local communities around the world. The goal is to become the leading tree planter globally.With over 3.3 million trees planted in 42 agroforestry projects to date, Treedom initiates positive impacts in Cameroon, Colombia, Ecuador, Ghana, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Italia, Kenya, Madagascar, Malawi, Nepal Tanzania and Thailandia. Treedom is a certified B Corp based in Florence (Tuscany) , Munich (Germany), London (UK), Paris (France) and Amsterdam (Netherlands) relies on the enthusiasm and experience of a team of over 100 people.
tags: Natural Resources, Social Entrepreneurship, Social Impact, environmental impact

name: LUISS EnLabs
businessDescription: We are a startup accelerator based in Rome, Italy. We are operated by LVenture Group, a publicly listed venture capital company that provides our startups with funding and network. Twice a year, we select a new batch of early-stage startups for our acceleration program.

name: Axess Power
businessDescription: We Provide Best Battery For The Better Backup
longBusinessDescription:
Axess Power have been serving quality, reliable and safe battery solutions worldwide for over a decade. Our battery products are designed and manufactured using the advanced equipment and committed to the most stringent quality control. This process is key to ensuring both consistency and reliability with any product that carries the Axess Power’s appellation.
Our range of battery products includes sealed maintenance free lead acid (SMF), gel, nickel cadmium, lithium iron and related accessories also, our R&D team are developing innovative solutions in the battery manufacturing for delivering a wide range of battery products.

name: Bagno Italiano
businessDescription: Online bathroom accessories retailer. More than 2.000 faucet models in assortment

name: Fubles
businessDescription: The Milan based social sport community Fubles helps you to organize pick-up sport matches of all types in a more efficient way. Started in 2007 as a free portal for amateur sport, Fubles became a company in 2009 and today it is probably one of the most active sport communities in Europe.
tags: Social Network, Sport Community, Event Planning

name: ROSE Intelligent Energy Management
businessDescription:
ROSE SMART ENERGYSOLUTIONS
With deep domain expertise and its cloud platforms, Maps helps companies develop new business models in the energy sector.
In particular, the company has developed ROSE Smart Energy Solutions, the innovative adaptive SaaS solution to manage smart grids, energy communities, predictive maintenance of high voltage electric grids and distributed renewable energy production systems.
Born in 2014 within the Genova Smart City Association, ROSE (Realtime Operational Smartgrid for Europe) is the software that manages the Smart Polygeneration Microgrid of the Savona Campus and the some of the main energy community pilots running in Italy.
tags: Energy Community, Smart Grid, Predictive Maintenance
longBusinessDescription:
Founded in 2002, Maps Spa is an Innovative SME-sized company, listed at Euronext Growth Milan that operates in the digital transformation sector.
Our challenge is to support companies in their transformation process offering intelligent software solutions capable of transforming big data in valuable business insights.
We do it by providing companies and public administrations with the tools to improve decision-making processes and innovate their business models through big data.
With the headquarters in Parma and offices in Milan and Genova and over 200 highly specialised employees, we work in the Energy & Utilities market to contribute to the country’s energy transition by creating innovative digital platforms.
